name: Johnson Elementary School
description: Public elementary school serving grades K-5 in Laurel County Public Schools district. Offers Gifted & Talented program, breakfast and lunch programs, and comprehensive educational services. Located in London, Kentucky with a dedicated staff including school counselor and teachers.
source: Verified from official Laurel County Schools website and NCES database
hours_of_operation: Opens at 7:30 AM (contact school for specific hours)
eligibility_requirements: Open to students in grades K-5 within the school district
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official Laurel County Schools website https://www.laurel.kyschools.us/o/jes. School details confirmed through GreatSchools.org and Niche.com. Phone number (606) 862-4664 confirmed working and listed across multiple sources. Address 1781 McWhorter Rd, London, KY 40741 verified through official school website and multiple directories. This is a public elementary school serving grades K-5 with a Gifted & Talented program, breakfast/lunch programs, and comprehensive educational services.
